directions: Beat cream, vinegar, eggs, sugar, mustard powder, and salt together in a large bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy.
Bring a saucepan of water to a boil. Place the bowl over the boiling water and cook the sauce, stirring constantly, until thick, about 20 minutes.
ingredients: 1/4 cup dry mustard powder (such as Coleman's®)
title: Outrageous Mustard Sauce
